All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AppLocker
    Locker class provides methods for locking mechanism and encapsulates socket-based message server for IPC.
    AppLocker.Builder
    AppLocker builder.
    LockIdEncoder
    Provides the safe way to encode application id such that it can be stored on filesystem without exceptions: invalid characters, too long etc.
    LockingBusyException
    Exception indicates that the lock has already been acquired.
    LockingCommunicationException
    Exception indicates that there is a problem with communication between current instance and lock holder.
    LockingException
    Superclass of all locking exceptions.
    LockingFailedException
    Exception indicates that there was a failure (most probably I/O) during acquiring the lock.
    LockingMessageServerException
    Exception indicates that there is an issue with message server.
    MessageHandler<I extends Serializable,​O extends Serializable>
    Interface for the function that runs on the server side and handles all incoming messages.
